meanings.definition: A person who studies or writes about chronology.
meanings.sent1: The chronologists carefully examined the timeline of historical events.
meanings.sent2: Many chronologists dedicate their lives to understanding the sequence of past occurrences.
meanings.sent3: The chronologists joked that they could predict the future by analyzing the past.
meanings.sent4: To the chronologists, time was like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The group of chronologists gathered to discuss the order of events in ancient civilizations.

meanings.definition: The study of time and the order in which events occur.
meanings.sent1: Studying chronologists helps us understand the flow of history.
meanings.sent2: The class on chronologists explored the concept of time in different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The book on chronologists made time seem like a fascinating mystery to unravel.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science fiction, chronologists can manipulate time itself.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on chronologists showcased various methods of tracking time.
